ee kale mashin wage wada karala karala lankawata awith mama aasakarana deyak karanna labima.lokuma duka - depala pa්rashna walata eka kaleka ape sahodara sahodariyan athara wu wirasakawimalokuma dinuma - yuropaye oonama ratakata gos jiwathwimata ma labu balapatha්rayalokuma parajaya - lokuma parajayak nam thawama labala nalokuma gamana - nimak nowana sangitha charikawalokuma pathuma - aapasu ipadenawa nam lakshman hewawitharana widiyatama ipadimahondama yahaluwa - eka eka wada waladi wiwidha aakaraye yaluwo innawahondama yeheliya - wiwidha yeheliyan innawahondama dawasa - adahondama thana - gedara sale mama indaganna supurudu thana saha nidaganna kottaya
